pragma solidity 0.4.24;

contract Sort {
    /**
     * @dev Sorts a list of integers in ascending order.
     *
     * The input list may be of any length.
     *
     * @param input The list of integers to sort.
     * @return The sorted list.
     */
   
    function sort(uint[] input) public pure returns(uint[]) {
        uint[] memory output = new uint[](input.length);
        uint256 max = 0;
        uint256 min = 0;
        min =min-1;//max int
        
        for(uint256 i=0;i<input.length;i++){
            max = (max<input[i])?input[i]:max;
            min = (min>input[i])?input[i]:min;
            output[i] = input[(i*113)%input.length]; //to randomize input little bit
        }
        if(output.length>1){
            partition(output,0,output.length-1);
        }
        return output;
    }
    
    
    
    function partition(uint256[] arr, uint256 si, uint256 ei) private pure returns(uint256)
    {
        if(ei-si>=3){
            uint256 pivot = arr[ei];
            uint256 pivotIndex = si;
        
            for (uint256 i = si; i <= ei; i++)
            {
                // swap if current is lesser than pivot
                if (arr[i] < pivot)
                {
                    uint256 t = arr[pivotIndex];
                    arr[pivotIndex] = arr[i];
                    arr[i] = t;
                    pivotIndex++;
                }
            }
        
            // swap pivot
            arr[ei] = arr[pivotIndex];
            arr[pivotIndex] = pivot;
                if ((pivotIndex - si ) > 1)
                {
                    partition(arr, si, pivotIndex-1);
                }
            
                if (( ei - pivotIndex) > 1)
                {
                    partition(arr, pivotIndex + 1, ei);
                }
            
            return pivotIndex;
        }
        else{
            if(ei-si==2){
                if (arr[si+1] < arr[si])
                {
                    t = arr[si];
                    arr[si] = arr[si+1];
                    arr[si+1] = t;
                }
                if (arr[si+2] < arr[si+1])
                {
                    t = arr[si+1];
                    arr[si+1] = arr[si+2];
                    arr[si+2] = t;
                }
                if (arr[si+1] < arr[si])
                {
                    t = arr[si];
                    arr[si] = arr[si+1];
                    arr[si+1] = t;
                }
            }else{
                if(ei-si==1){
                    if (arr[ei] < arr[si])
                    {
                        t = arr[si];
                        arr[si] = arr[ei];
                        arr[ei] = t;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
